SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]

    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]

    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]

SELECT [t0].[Id], [t0].[Completed], [t0].[Description], [t0].[DueDate], [t0].[Title], [t0].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId]
    FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
    WHERE [t].[Id] = @__taskId_0
) AS [t0]
LEFT JOIN [TaskTags] AS [t1] ON [t0].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t0].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]
[2025-12-07 14:00:06 INF] Request finished HTTP/1.1 GET http://localhost:5063/api/tags - 200 null application/json; charset=utf-8 417.5575ms

[2025-12-07 14:00:09 INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

[2025-12-07 14:00:52 INF] Executed DbCommand (120ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]
[2025-12-07 14:00:52 INF] Executed DbCommand (120ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

[2025-12-07 14:00:53 INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

[2025-12-07 14:09:07 INF] Fetching all tasks with filter and sort
[2025-12-07 14:09:07 INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]
[2025-12-07 14:09:07 INF] Executing OkObjectResult, writing value of type 'System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[backend.Domain.Entities.TaskItem, backend, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]]'.

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

[2025-12-07 14:09:56 INF] Fetching all tasks with filter and sort
[2025-12-07 14:09:56 INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Completed], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Title], [t].[UserId], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Name]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t1].[TaskItemId], [t1].[TagId]

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[TaskItemId], [t0].[TagId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Name]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskItemId]
